Title: P2017/1428/NE - Legal Services for Potential Judicial Review
Description: Legal Services for Potential Judicial Review over decision to close and relocate library.

Title: The Provision of Cleaning Services for Derby City Councils Connect Derby Buildings
Description:
Connect Derby currently operates a facility management service in 7 Council owned buildings. The buildings operate as business hubs for private sector companies. There are 5 buildings in Derby city centre and two outside of the city centre:

1.	Friar Gate Studios, Ford Street, Derby, DE11EE
2.	Sadler Bridge Studios, Bold Lane, Derby, DE1
3.	Kings Chambers, Queen Street, Derby, DE1
4.	Riverside Chambers, Full Street, Derby, DE1
5.	Shot Tower, The Morledge, Derby, DE1
6.	Marble Hall, Nightingale Road, Osmaston, Derby, DE24
7.	iHub, Infinity Park Way, Infinity Park, Derby, DE24 9FU

As part of the Connect Derby offer it is essential we provide a clean environment for all staff, visitors and service users within the buildings which is compliant with legislation, rules, regulations and statutory requirements relating to the service.  This procurement supports statutory requirement, it involves a European Regional Development Fund (ERDF) grant.
Additional Text: Please note, suppliers wishing to express interest and obtain the documentation, must do so by 14:00 on 02/05/2017. It is recommended that you express interest and obtain the documentation well before this time to allow sufficient time to prepare and submit a comprehensive response. The deadline for returns is 14:00 on 03/05/2017. Select the 'apply online' link in the bottom right hand corner of this notice, this will transfer you to the Councils e-tendering system https://www.eastmidstenders.org where you can express interest and obtain the documents, (please note we will only accept expressions of interest through the e-tendering system.
